0xA09E7E7B.name: SAVE_RESOURCE_FILE

params.name: data
params.description: The data to write to the file.

params.name: dataLength
params.description: The length of the written data.

0xA09E7E7B.description:
Writes the specified data to a file in the specified resource.
Using a length of `-1` will automatically detect the length assuming the data is a C string.
0xA09E7E7B.resultsDescription: A value indicating if the write succeeded.
